DOC.brief_summary: Study to obtain data about changing from the chlorofluorocarbon (CFC) - containing Berotec® 200 µg metered - dose inhaler to the CFC - free Berotec® N 100 µg metered - dose inhaler
DOC.brief_title: Postmarketing Surveillance Study of Berotec® N 100 µg Metered-dose Inhaler in Chronic Obstructive Respiratory Tract Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients were included in the study only if they had been treated with Berotec® 200 µg metered dose inhaler before switching to the CFCfree Berotec® N 100 µg metered dose inhaler • Contraindications listed in the Instructions for Use/Summary of Product Characteristics for Berotec® N 100 µg metered dose inhaler
